member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandQueue.AssertResourceState
member.summary: Checks whether a resource, or subresource, is in a specified state, or not.
member.param: The index of the subresource to check. This can be set to an index, or D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER_ALL_SUBRESOURCES.
Specifies the state to check for. This can be one or more D3D12_RESOURCE_STATES flags Or'ed together.
member.returns: This method returns true if the resource or subresource is in the specified state, false otherwise.

member.name: ID3D12DebugCommandQueue
member.summary: Provides methods to monitor and debug a command queue.
